items.title: HotKeys.js
items.meta: A robust Javascript library for capturing keyboard input and key combinations entered.

items.title: Cycled
items.meta: Cycle through the items of an array.

items.title: Github.js
items.meta: A higher-level wrapper around the Github API. Intended for the browser.

items.title: React Waypoint
items.meta: A React component to execute a function whenever you scroll to an element.
